text: do you have a french version and an english version of the page?
No. Just a French version.

Hello everybody, i’m new here.

I’m working in a template for landing pages and i can’t upload `webp` images to template folder =/ Has some issue about this?

VScode x Template files un HubSpot
does the french version have a different url? Are all of your pages in french?
If you are using a separate language for a page, then it is going to create a canonical connection..
Does your site have french and english pages ?
When I've created my pages, I've always chosen "France - Français". This create automatically a multinlingual version?
I’m guessing that is what is going on. I’m not sure best practice is for this when developing on HubSpot and only using one language… i’m not very up to date on multilingual stuff
Thanks a lot. I know what to seek now. :+1:
If it bothers you you could likely remove it via javascript, it should happen in the header code which you really can’t access
You were right. I have changed the French by "No language", and alternate page tag has disappeared. Thanks a lot Nicholas.
Glad that solved your issue. Have a great day!

Can you overwrite the link the built-in logo module goes to?  For example, we have a logo module the user sets for a landing page.  Ideally, this logo would go to the landing page, not the root domain, but that isn't what is happening. I know I can use an image and link but figured I'd try to use what is built-in first. TIA!
In the module it will give you the option to do so I belive. OF is that just the image?
I'm only getting the logo file itself and you can set it to override the default logo, but no link is included. I was hoping I could pass a parameter to the module
:disappointed:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/tags#logo>
looks like you can

Awesome- thank you for always replying and helping me fix my little issues. I would think that if this is part of the properties the user should be able to edit those properties when choosing a logo to override.  In this case it is ok to do it separately. Thanks!
is there a way to customize the HubSpot Sales quoting tool? I have a client that would like to break about out the monthly sub-totals from the one-time sub totals... Is that possible???

Hi!  I've been doing the practicum for CMS for developers certification, and I have a question with the module part it says that it must to containt at least 5 default entries at the template level but each of this default entries need to be differents ? because it apperare me the same person five times and in the screen shot it shows five diferent persons:white_frowning_face:
Didn't have access to that, but I figured something out via specificity
